channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: LLaMA: Open and Efficient Foundation Language Models
item.description: We introduce LLaMA, a collection of foundation language models ranging from 7B to 65B parameters.

item.title: Composer: Creative and Controllable Image Synthesis with Composable Conditions
item.description: Recent large-scale generative models learned on big data are capable of synthesizing incredible images yet suffer from limited controllability.

item.title: Multimodal Chain-of-Thought Reasoning in Language Models
item.description: Large language models (LLMs) have shown impressive performance on complex reasoning by leveraging chain-of-thought (CoT) prompting to generate intermediate reasoning chains as the rationale to infer the answer.

item.title: Adding Conditional Control to Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: Moreover, training a ControlNet is as fast as fine-tuning a diffusion model, and the model can be trained on a personal devices.

item.title: VoxFormer: Sparse Voxel Transformer for Camera-based 3D Semantic Scene Completion
item.description: To enable such capability in AI systems, we propose VoxFormer, a Transformer-based semantic scene completion framework that can output complete 3D volumetric semantics from only 2D images.

item.title: AltCLIP: Altering the Language Encoder in CLIP for Extended Language Capabilities
item.description: In this work, we present a conceptually simple and effective method to train a strong bilingual/multilingual multimodal representation model.

item.title: Why Can GPT Learn In-Context? Language Models Secretly Perform Gradient Descent as Meta-Optimizers
item.description: In order to better understand how ICL works, this paper explains language models as meta-optimizers and understands ICL as a kind of implicit finetuning.

item.title: BioGPT: Generative Pre-trained Transformer for Biomedical Text Generation and Mining
item.description: Pre-trained language models have attracted increasing attention in the biomedical domain, inspired by their great success in the general natural language domain.

item.title: Colossal-Auto: Unified Automation of Parallelization and Activation Checkpoint for Large-scale Models
item.description: To address these challenges, we introduce a system that can jointly optimize distributed execution and gradient checkpointing plans.

item.title: 3D-aware Conditional Image Synthesis
item.description: We propose pix2pix3D, a 3D-aware conditional generative model for controllable photorealistic image synthesis.

item.title: MultiDiffusion: Fusing Diffusion Paths for Controlled Image Generation
item.description: In this work, we present MultiDiffusion, a unified framework that enables versatile and controllable image generation, using a pre-trained text-to-image diffusion model, without any further training or finetuning.

item.title: Learn to Explain: Multimodal Reasoning via Thought Chains for Science Question Answering
item.description: We further design language models to learn to generate lectures and explanations as the chain of thought (CoT) to mimic the multi-hop reasoning process when answering ScienceQA questions.

item.title: T2I-Adapter: Learning Adapters to Dig out More Controllable Ability for Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: The incredible generative ability of large-scale text-to-image (T2I) models has demonstrated strong power of learning complex structures and meaningful semantics.

item.title: DAMO-YOLO : A Report on Real-Time Object Detection Design
item.description: In this report, we present a fast and accurate object detection method dubbed DAMO-YOLO, which achieves higher performance than the state-of-the-art YOLO series.

item.title: The Forward-Forward Algorithm: Some Preliminary Investigations
item.description: The aim of this paper is to introduce a new learning procedure for neural networks and to demonstrate that it works well enough on a few small problems to be worth further investigation.

item.title: Learning Visual Representations via Language-Guided Sampling
item.description: Although an object may appear in numerous contexts, we often describe it in a limited number of ways.

item.title: Discovering faster matrix multiplication algorithms with reinforcement learning
item.description: Particularly relevant is the case of 4 × 4 matrices in a finite field, where AlphaTensor’s algorithm improves on Strassen’s two-level algorithm for the first time, to our knowledge, since its discovery 50 years ago2.

item.title: MarioGPT: Open-Ended Text2Level Generation through Large Language Models
item.description: Procedural Content Generation (PCG) algorithms provide a technique to generate complex and diverse environments in an automated way.

item.title: HTNet: Human Topology Aware Network for 3D Human Pose Estimation
item.description: 3D human pose estimation errors would propagate along the human body topology and accumulate at the end joints of limbs.

item.title: Symbolic Discovery of Optimization Algorithms
item.description: We present a method to formulate algorithm discovery as program search, and apply it to discover optimization algorithms for deep neural network training.
